title: Arquimbau (Ramon Masferrer y)
body: A physician from the Barcelona school, born in Vich on May 15, 1850, and died in the Philippines on April 5, 1884. Author of: Catalogo razonado de la Flora de Tenerife y notas sobre la Flora de todo el arquipélago Canario, Madeira e demais islas de aquela región botánica (no place or date of publication).

Barcelona: Place of education of Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau
Vich: Birthplace of Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau
Filipinas: Place of death of Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau

Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau: Physician educated at the Barcelona school

1850: Birth of Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau
1884: Death of Ramon Masferrer y Arquimbau
